issue.title: [Python] Expose C++ MakeArrayOfNull
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7375](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7375). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would allow creating an array of nulls efficiently. Perhaps expose it as `pa.Array.all_nulls` or something.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7375?focusedCommentId=16994402) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
It could maybe also be a `pa.nulls(size, type)` function (in the same vein as np.empty, np.ones, np.zeros). Although that's of course only a subtle difference in spelling as the `pa.null()` for creating the type ..
